meanings.definition: A popular Indian snack made with puffed rice, vegetables, and tamarind sauce.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed eating bhelpuri at the street food festival.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes delicious bhelpuri for our picnics.
meanings.sent3: The bhelpuri danced on my taste buds with its crunchy goodness.
meanings.sent4: The bhelpuri was a colorful mosaic of flavors in a single bite.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of bhelpuri filled the air, tempting everyone nearby.
